0.text:
Ujjwal Jha
Hyderabad, India
+91 7260059459
2001ujjwaljha@gmail.com — LinkedIn — GitHub — Portfolio
Professional Summary
Generative AI & Full-Stack Engineer with 2 years of experience building production-grade AI systems and
scalable distributed backend architectures. Specialized in Agentic AI systems, Retrieval-Augmented Generation
(RAG), LLM orchestration, and high-integrity transactional systems. Strong expertise in concurrency control,
database design, asynchronous processing, and cloud-native deployments.
Technical Skills
•Generative AI & Agents:LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, OpenAI API, RAG pipelines, hybrid retrieval,
embeddings, prompt engineering, hallucination mitigation, context optimization
•Backend Engineering:Python, FastAPI, Node.js, NestJS, Spring Boot, REST APIs, OpenAPI,
microservices architecture
•Databases:PostgreSQL, Oracle XE, MongoDB, Pinecone, FAISS, Chroma, indexing strategies, ACID
transactions, schema optimization
•Distributed Systems:Asynchronous workflows, concurrency handling, pessimistic locking, idempotency
design, event-driven processing
•DevOps:Docker, Docker Compose, Railway, Render, Vercel, Hugging Face Spaces, Git
•Core CS:Data Structures & Algorithms, System Design, OOP, SOLID principles
Professional Experience
GenAI Engineer (Full-Stack)Aug 2025 – Present
Bosch Global Software Technologies – Hyderabad, India
•Architected multi-agent AI systems using LangChain and LangGraph with dynamic tool execution and
reasoning workflows.
•Designed and deployed production-grade RAG pipelines including ingestion, chunking, embeddings, hybrid
semantic retrieval, and grounded generation.
•Reduced hallucination rate by 30% through structured prompt evaluation and response validation frameworks.
•Built scalable FastAPI services with asynchronous execution and OpenAPI documentation.
•Implemented structured logging, monitoring, and containerized deployments using Docker.
Full-Stack EngineerJan 2025 – Aug 2025
Bosch Global Software Technologies – Hyderabad, India
•Developed modular backend services using Node.js and Spring Boot within microservices architecture.
•Optimized SQL indexing strategies reducing API latency by 20%.
•Implemented secure coding practices and CI-based deployment workflows.
Full-Stack DeveloperMar 2024 – Dec 2024
ABL Education – Noida

ABL Education – Noida, India
•Built full-stack React applications with RESTful backend services.
•Improved backend query performance by 25% through optimized schema design. Selected Systems & Projects
IntelliTrack – AI-Powered Competitive Intelligence Platform
FastAPI, PostgreSQL, OpenAI GPT-3.5, AsyncIO, Docker
•Built a SaaS-grade platform tracking competitor pricing, documentation, and changelogs.
•Implemented paragraph-level smart diffing with strategic noise filtering to eliminate dynamic content.
•Integrated LLM-based categorization of pricing, feature, and positioning changes.
•Designed snapshot versioning with historical tracking and backend health monitoring.
•Deployed full-stack solution (Frontend: Vercel, Backend: Railway).
Live: Frontend — Backend — GitHub
High-Integrity Wallet & Double-Entry Ledger System
NestJS, PostgreSQL, ACID Transactions, Concurrency Control
•Designed immutable ledger-based wallet using double-entry accounting.
•Implemented row-level pessimistic locking (SELECT FOR UPDATE) preventing race conditions.
•Enforced idempotency via unique keys guaranteeing exactly-once transaction processing.
•Ensured strict ACID compliance and transactional consistency under concurrent load.
Live: API — GitHub
High-Scale Energy Telemetry Ingestion Engine
NestJS, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, Docker
•Built ingestion system handling 14.4M records/day from 10,000+ smart meters.
•Implemented Hot/Cold data split (append-only history + upsert-based live status).
•Optimized analytics endpoint using composite indexing without full table scans.
•Designed AC/DC efficiency analytics for fleet monitoring dashboards.
Live: API — GitHub
Acme Tech RAG Chatbot (Full-Stack)
FastAPI, Pinecone, OpenAI GPT-3.5, React, Vite
•Built end-to-end RAG system with document ingestion, embedding, and semantic retrieval.
•Integrated Pinecone vector database with GPT-3

2.text:
+ upsert-based live status).
•Optimized analytics endpoint using composite indexing without full table scans.
•Designed AC/DC efficiency analytics for fleet monitoring dashboards.
Live: API — GitHub
Acme Tech RAG Chatbot (Full-Stack)
FastAPI, Pinecone, OpenAI GPT-3.5, React, Vite
•Built end-to-end RAG system with document ingestion, embedding, and semantic retrieval.
•Integrated Pinecone vector database with GPT-3.5 for grounded answer generation.
•Developed responsive React frontend deployed on Vercel.
•Designed clean API-first architecture separating ingestion and query pipelines.
Live: Frontend — Backend — Backend Repo — Frontend Repo
Production-Grade RAG Knowledge Assistant
Python, FastAPI, Vector Databases, Docker
•Built API-first Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with ingestion, chunking, embedding, and hybrid
retrieval.
•Implemented source attribution and hallucination monitoring mechanisms.
•Designed modular RAG pipeline supporting document updates and incremental ingestion.
•Containerized and deployed using Docker on Hugging Face Spaces. Live: Hugging Face Deployment — GitHub
AI Insight Dashboard – Full-Stack Analytics Platform
React, TypeScript, Node.js, REST APIs
•Developed enterprise-style analytics dashboard for structured data visualization.
•Built reusable modular UI components and optimized REST API integrations.
•Implemented dynamic charts, filtering logic, and responsive layouts.
•Deployed frontend on Vercel with production-ready configuration.
Live: Live Demo — GitHub
Education
Bachelor of Technology – Electronics and Communication Engineering
Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
2019 – 2023
